content: We are Ethereum Mexico, a team of multi-disciplinary Ethereum and Web3 enthusiasts from different cities in Mexico who are passionate about educating people to use blockchain technology securely and inspiring them to build in Web3 while promoting the values of Ethereum. Our mission is to serve as the bridge between the Ethereum ecosystem, the Ethereum Foundation, and other communities in Mexico. Our vision is to be one of the main access points for people who want to learn about Web3/Ethereum and provide the tools for them to participate and build in Ethereum. We aim to be a reliable and trustworthy source of high-quality Ethereum content in Spanish and support local communities to learn about Ethereum by providing them with the tools to build in Ethereum. Our team adds value by providing support and assistance to local communities (and individuals) throughout the country, contributing to the construction of communities and new projects related to Ethereum.
